name: TOGETHER (itch) (Abhay Venugopal, mjolnir42)
description:
TOGETHER

_______________________________________________________________

What the golf meets physics

by - APS

OVERVIEW

•Together is a survival 2 player game where both players are required to help each other out with obstacles, traps and puzzles they face to escape the dungeon. 

 

             

_____________________________________________________________________

GOAL

The design goal of the game is to solve puzzles and escape the dungeon through teamwork

_____________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS Keyboard and mouse
  • Change Direction  - "WASD"
  • JUMP                     - PLAYER 1 "SPACE" & PLAYER 2 "ENTER"
  • Interact                  - PLAYER 1 "E" & PLAYER 2 "L"
_____________________________________________ TEAM MEMBERS

Abhay Venugopal - PM, Level Designer 

Parinith pradeep - Programmer, Game Designer

Sinan Bakkaloglu - Artist, Designer
